content: lion brand pattern # 70022 corrections applied mar 20 2007 skill level easy + level 3 jazz article #105 100% linen *discontinued* 2 colors 490 yards each crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm worked with 1 strand each of a and b held together *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
